name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its classic buttons and a screen displaying a red and black color palette, RetroBot gives off a nostalgic vibe. It is equipped with a pair of sleek shades that adds a touch of style to its appearance. RetroBot is known for its exceptional abilities and skills, making it an invaluable member of the club.
